description:
Givenchy, the epitome of audacity in luxury fashion, invites you to join as a Sales Specialist. Immerse yourself in audacious collections and deliver personalized shopping experiences defining Givenchy’s legacy.

Role Overview

As a Sales Assistant you will be responsible for supporting the sales process by processing client transactions and supporting one of our Style Advisors in the Rodeo Drive Boutique through the clienteling process.

YOUR MISSION & IMPACT

  • Partner with the Style Advisor to discuss clienteling needs and support
  • Accurately process client transactions on the POS system
  • Gather client information in database
  • Verify the price of merchandise as necessary
  • Wrap and bag merchandise
  • Assist in general housekeeping and the maintenance of the store image
  • Assist Client Advisor during any VIC event for top clients
  • Run merchandise and support shipping and receiving and inventory control as requested

YOUR ADDED VALUE

Experience:

  • 1+ years’ experience in a retail environment
  • Tech Savvy - ability to learn and use various software programs

Competencies:

  • Ability to work in a team setting
  • Desire to work in a retail setting, with a focus on sales
  • Passion for luxury product with an appreciation for design
  • Customer service oriented
  • Ability to work a flexible schedule based on business needs which includes, evenings, weekends, and holidays

OUR ENGAGEMENT

At Givenchy, we offer a generous benefits package including medical insurance, bonus structure, paid time off, holiday pay, 401k, automatic employee contribution, and more.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, and to perform essential job functions.

The compensation for this position ranges from $18 - $20 hourly. The rate of pay offered will be dependent upon candidate’s relevant skills and experience. In addition, there is a comprehensive benefits package including: medical, dental, vision, short and long-term disability, various paid time off programs, employee discount/perks, and a retirement plan with employer contribution.
